summary: This ads two CME presets for ECE Mod
descriptionHtml:
Just as the title suggests, this is simply a small preset file.

One for the Nord race and one for the Imperial race.

To make your character look like in the screenshots you will need several mods.
They are:

Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?

SG Female Eyebrows by Hello Santa: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?

SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?

The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?

SG Hair Pack: The file is not available on the NEXUS and I can not link you to the file because I'm not sure if the author allows it. But to find it simply Google or YouTube SG Hair Pack

To install this, put the preset files (.slot) in the skyrim CME_save Folder

That's pretty much it.

All the credit goes to the mod authors that made this possible.

I hope you like the presets. Enjoy.
author: Dlon93
